channel.title: Homepage
channel.description: I think the moparisthebest.com homepage is fairly boring. if you could add a backround like moparscape's backround (only an example, there is better than that) and add some music it would be a lot better.

item.title: Homepage
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“Mod Taharok, post:11, topic:58232”][quote author=God of Ikiliki link=topic=83450.msg985494#msg985494 date=1173386668]
I like the homepage at the moment.
I just think we need to add some more things to it such as a small logo and all news should be posted there also.
Just like a weekly news page.

Cause it takes years to see 1 little update lol.
About the bg music.
It’s not annoying.
Just 1 problem,
Rockers always like Rock, Old ppl like Classic etc.
No one is the same.
[/quote]

People also have to be flexible with each other’s personalities. I can’t go having a fit just because another Moderator does something different than how I do it. ;)[/quote]
Yup true

Read full topic

item.title: Homepage
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

I don’t know about the music because people who are still on Dial-up connections would lag, thus making them want to leave. Remember when you make a suggestion take everyone into consideration, not just what you would like.

The Java application background could be spiced up a little, but as I am terrible with both graphics and web design I’ll accept it cause I know I couldn’t do any better

Read full topic

item.title: Homepage
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

The website is designed to look like a java application, which I think is pretty cool. I’ve never seen another website like it.

As for music, that is one of those most annoying things someone could put on a website.

Read full topic
